text.div:
FEV1/FVC <70, FEV1 <60, and COPD Symptoms

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    G8924 Spirometry test results demonstrate fev1/fvc < 70%, fev < 60% predicted and patient has copd symptoms (e.g., dyspnea, cough/sputum, wheezing)

concept.display: Spirometry test results demonstrate fev1/fvc < 70%, fev < 60% predicted and patient has copd symptoms (e.g., dyspnea, cough/sputum, wheezing)
